{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.16540v1", "title": "Contact homology of contact manifolds and its applications", "summary": "This is a survey of contact homology and its applications to the study of
contact manifolds. It is a small tribute to Yasha Eliashberg's huge generosity
with his countless explanations of his deep mathematical insights all along his
career. It is also the author's wishful thinking that this text could be useful
to students and young mathematicians for learning about some of the holomorphic
curves based invariants in contact geometry.", "main_category": "math.SG", "categories": "math.SG,math.DG,math.GT", "published": "2025-04-23T09:10:37Z"}
